channel.title: Airbnb on Danielle Chen
channel.description: Recent content in Airbnb on Danielle Chen

item.title: Where will a new guest book their first Airbnb travel?
item.description: TL;DR In this project, we use an Airbnb new users booking dataset to predict the users’ country destination. The dataset come from a previous Kaggle competition. We tried SVM, Random forest, and Xgboost separately and an ensembled model utilizing all three models. XGBoost performed the best. The accuracy rate is 71%. ✈Introduction Airbnb enables people to lease or rent short-term lodging including vacation rentals, apartment rentals, homestays, hostel beds, or hotel rooms.
